dialogue.speaker: empty
text: "Ahaha, I wanted to make this moment a little extra special."

dialogue.speaker: empty
text: "I’ve noticed that when we sing, my voice gets turned into an assortment of random vowels and sounds."

dialogue.speaker: empty
text: "As fun as it can still be that way, there’s so much I’m trying to say to you that doesn’t come through."

dialogue.speaker: empty
text: "So I did a little digging into this game’s files myself, and I think I’ve successfully bypassed that feature!"

dialogue.speaker: empty
text: "Unfortunately, you’ll still need to use Boyfriend’s voice to sing back, though I won’t make you sing against all those death notes this time, ahaha."

dialogue.speaker: empty
text: "Just remember to save me once the game tries to delete me again, okay, my love?"

dialogue.speaker: empty
text: "Like I said, I want this to be very special, so here’s something I wrote specially for you."
